name: EMBEEM
tag_list: sales, sales-agent, sales-rep, sales-representative, distributor, distribution
overview:
EMBEEM specializes in helping companies find qualified independent sales representatives in different parts of the world.

EMBEEM is a group of companies, headquartered in the USA, that owns and operates several web portals around the globe. It offers a range of services designed to assist companies to connect with independent sales agents and distributors, expand marketing efforts, and optimize their web presence.

Our web portals are: • SalesAgentUSA.com • SalesAgentEurope.com • SalesAgentIndia.com • SalesAgentChina.com • SalesAgentAfrica.com • SalesAgentSouthAmerica.com • SalesAgentAustralia.com

We have thousands of sales agents registered with us around the world and we continue to grow our network by the hundreds every month across various categories and industries. The sales agents who join our network are actively searching for new product lines and opportunities to get involved with. Many of the sales agents are established and well-connected in their industry, but are still looking for new product lines and opportunities. The sales agents are generally looking for either commission-only, buy/resell, or fixed-salary arrangements.

The EMBEEM group is comprised of three different companies. EMBEEM Incorporated is located in New Jersey, USA. EMBEEM Enterprises Private Limited is located in Mumbai, India. EMBEEM Limited is located in London, UK.
